name: Triangulation
overview: A puzzle strategy game created by Dave Johannsen and published in both Loadstar #072, and Loadstar #124. A Tic-Tac-Toe-like strategy game that challenges you to make an equilateral triangle before you C64 opponent can. Take turns playing pieces on a triangular grid, trying to create an equilateral triangle of a certain type of playing piece. The first to do so wins. Use the options to set the game parameters. You can get back here at any point using the F8 key. You can choose game board size, default is size 4 and it goes up to 7. You can also set the strategy for your opponent, open or closed strategy. Try them both! There are four types of pieces. Diamond, X, Triangle and 0. Triangles must be made of similar pieces. Full game instructions and strategy info from F2 in game.
